mapper.sql: FROM party a LEFT JOIN memberParty mp ON a.partySeq = mp.partySeqF LEFT JOIN member m ON m.memberSeq = mp.memberSeqF WHERE 1=1 AND a.partyOwnerTierCd = #{voPartyOwnerTierCd} AND a.partyMatchTypeCd = #{voPartyMatchTypeCd} AND a.partyName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{voPartyName},'%')
mapper.select: select partySeq ,partyName ,partyDept ,partyOwnerTierCd ,partyMatchTypeCd ,partyOwnerRate ,partyOwnerKDA ,partyDelNy ,partyRegDate ,partyModDate from party where 1=1 and partySeq = #{partySeq}
select partySeq from party where 1=1 and partySeq = #{partySeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE party SET partyDelNy=1 where 1=1 and partySeq=#{partySeq}
mapper.select: select partySeq, partyName from party where 1=1 AND partyDelNy=0

SELECT a.partySeq , a.partyName , a.partyDept , a.partyOwnerTierCd , a.partyOwnerRate , a.partyOwnerKDA , a.partyMatchTypeCd , a.partyDelNy , a.partyRegDate , a.partyModDate , m.memberName as xMemberName , mp.masterNy
ORDER BY a.partySeq desc, a.partyName, a.partySeq
